text:
Created attachment 31213
Screenshot of stale menus

Just installed JMeter 2.11 (r1554548) on Ubuntu 13.10 64-bit machine. 
java version "1.6.0_27"
OpenJDK Runtime Environment (IcedTea6 1.12.6) (6b27-1.12.6-1ubuntu2.1)
OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 20.0-b12, mixed mode)

When I use the context menu from an object in the tree list on the left I get menu lists that remain on screen and active. See screenshot.

Workaround: Installed:
java version "1.7.0_25"
OpenJDK Runtime Environment (IcedTea 2.3.12) (7u25-2.3.12-4ubuntu3)
OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 23.7-b01, mixed mode)

Seems to have fixed the issue but will need to use it more to confirm.
creator: jmeter@erlewein.org
